Description:
RELAXED LIFESTYLE ESCAPE
A tranquil escape from the hustle and bustle of daily life, this superb home provides a peaceful environment to raise a family, settle into retirement or as a superb entry into the property market. Beautifully detailed with bamboo floorboards, the light-filled lounge enjoys verdant vistas and cathedral ceilings, while the adjoining dining zone links through the attractive kitchen with upright cooker and soft close drawers. A spectacular space for entertaining rests outside in the form of a huge, covered alfresco deck that's accompanied by a bungalow/games room/4th bedroom and extends onto the backyard, ideal for burning off the children's excess energy. All three bedrooms run off the hallway and include built-in-robes, serviced by a family bathroom, separate toilet and full-sized laundry with deck access. Enhanced by fresh paintwork, gas heating, split system air conditioning, solar electricity panels, garden shed, water tank plus two driveways for excellent parking. Representing an idyllic lifestyle on 976sqm approx., close to schools, shops and public transport.
Photo ID required at all open for inspections.
In-room Auction Tuesday 16th April at 7pm
Venue: 5/1849 Ferntree Gully Road, Ferntree Gully
To view the statement of information click the below link:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1UJ4uVFVX-L-m9jyLe0-j_BfYjehTm1a6?usp=sharing
Insights: 3 Birdwood Avenue, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2019 and 38 other 3 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
BIG EVERYTHING! LAND, GARAGING & ROOMS WITH SUBDIVISION POTENTIAL
Looking for sealed road access to your land holding of just over 3300m2 with subdivision potential (subject to council approval)? Are you searching for two double garages one with interior access to the home? Do your children want rooms big enough for a queen bed, desk and couch? What about a huge games/rumpus/TV room and separate lounge? Add to that contemporary kitchen/dining with stainless steel appliances, updated and stylish ensuite, family bathroom and laundry. If you answered YES, you best come and inspect this fabulous family home that also offers a long deck, rear paved entertaining, circular driveway with plenty of parking, partially fenced for a pony and not to forget lovely treed views. Just a hop, skip and a jump away from the quaint township of Cockatoo, sporting clubs, school and bus connections. 4 Belgrave Avenue could be just the one youve been waiting for!
Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684 522 or Mat Fitch 0473 363 606 or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection today.

Modestly monastical but ready to be sprung into life by your creative renos .
Imagine sipping a brew on the front porch of this delightful weatherboard .
If I wasn't selling it I would be buying it . Somebody stop me .

Description:
OFI CANCELLED
Million Dollar Views on Paternoster
Spectacular views to Westernport & Port Phillip Bay to the front and bushland views from the backyard of this neat brick home built circa 1996. There's tailor-made parking for the caravan, large driveway, double garage with remote doors direct interior access, rear access for trailers, a workshop shed, wood storage, chicken coop and the pièce de résistance...a large covered entertaining deck surrounded by a bed of camellias and a weeping mulberry tree. The block feels so much more expansive than just three quarters of an acre.
Inside, the split-level home has 3 good size bedrooms and a 4th, that shares access to the master ensuite and could also be used as a study with an exterior door to the garden. The front lounge has a bay window with bay views! The kitchen is entirely serviceable but would enjoy an update and looks over the sunken family/rumpus with wood-fired coonara.
The location could not be better, set back on the prestigious (sealed) Paternoster Road allowing quick passage to Pakenham, Berwick & local townships of Emerald & Cockatoo.
This one will fly!
Need more info? Call Katie on 0428 744 498
Insights: 11 Paternoster Road, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2019 and 20 other 4 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
THE PERFECT STARTER ON OVER 1500M2
Privately positioned within walking distance to the township of Cockatoo, is this spacious Glenvill brick home offering a blank canvas and an abundance of possibilities only limited by your imagination.
The home provides a very flexible and functional floorplan, the master bedroom is zoned at one end of the home and is equipped with ensuite and walk in robe, along with a spacious living area heated by a solid fuel fire. The large central kitchen offers plenty of bench space, electric cooking, dishwasher and lots of natural light flooding through while overlooking the dining area and second living area.
The remaining two bedrooms are fitted with built in robes and are serviced by the family bathroom.
Outside boasts a fully fenced rear yard with garden shed and wood storage, while the front of the property accommodates multiple cars or the perfect place to build the shed you have always wanted.
Call today, inspection is a must!!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Cottage Cutie with a Modern Twist!
This delightful cottage oozes warmth, charm & character with all of today's modern conveniences!
Boasting 3 bedrooms, master with full ensuite & built in robe, two separate living areas, modern kitchen offering quality appliances, pressed metal splashback & timber bench tops which overlook the living room.
Special features also include double hung windows, gas ducted heating, spa bath & much more....
Enjoy the fully fenced yard and private outlook from the covered deck, which means you can let the kids play while you relax, with the bonus of a single garage with concrete floors and power for the handyman who loves to tinker. This 1015m2 block (approx.) even has a dual access point from a private lane and plenty of car parking for those unexpected visitors.
Note: This property is currently tenanted until 10/01/2019
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Stylish Living with 2 Homes on 1.3 acres!
On offer are two outstanding residences situated on an elevated 1.3 acre block. Meander up the driveway past the pony paddock and the second house to this immaculately presented 4 bedroom home. There is absolutely nothing to do with this beautiful home – just move in and enjoy. The inviting entry foyer is adjacent to the formal living room and gives you a sense of comfort and style that his home offers with its earthy tones, lush carpet and quality slate tiles. The cleverly designed kitchen includes a sizable island bench with an induction cooktop, ample bench space and a very handy ‘butler pantry’ style nook to delight the avid cook in the family. The kitchen space flawlessly integrates with the main living area which includes a meals area, all which is bathed in natural light from the distinctive stain glass feature window, full length windows and the feature skylight. Controlling the atmosphere in this main living area is effortless with the quality remote controlled window blinds. Your comfort will be assured throughout this home with the gas ducted heating, ducted reverse cycle cooling and ceiling fans. Appreciate some time out relaxing in the private outdoor courtyard taking in the serenity or enjoy the company of family and friends in the choice of outdoor entertaining areas: east facing paved alfresco area welcoming the morning sun or the separate covered entertaining deck taking advantage of the afternoon shade.
Featuring four bedrooms, the spacious Master has a stunning ensuite containing a double shower. The functional family bathroom is also tastefully styled and the laundry provides the much needed room for the demands of a family.
Outside the feature list continues with landscaped gardens, paved walkways, large lock up garage with concrete floor, power and plumbing, double carport with high roof perfect for caravan storage, potting shed, fruit trees, chook shed and a second pony paddock complete with two stable bays.
Located also on this superb property is a second residence that is completely separate to the main home and is fully fenced. This delightful second residence has an open style kitchen and living area, two sizable bedrooms, family bathroom, European laundry, gas wall furnace and a reverse split system for total comfort. This home has elevated views of the surrounding area and operates on a separate meter.
With space, style, quality and comfort, this outstanding property has so much to offer. Only an inspection will reveal the true magnitude of this beautiful residence.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office

Description:
Move Straight In - Nothing to Do!
Set on a private half acre, you will be charmed by this character home conveniently located close to the Cockatoo township. Just move in and personalise as all the hard work has been attended to by the current owner with a rebuild 5 years ago. Complying with BAL requirements & modern day energy ratings - tinted double glazed windows, roof/wall/floor insulation, individual split systems to the bedrooms and living area providing year round comfort throughout the home - it includes the balance of the builders’ warranty.
This home provides a feeling of space and comfort with 3 generously proportioned robed bedrooms, large open plan living/dining area with cathedral ceilings, well appointed kitchen with abundant storage and bench space, stylish modern bathroom and large laundry with ample cupboard and bench space. A 7mx7m carport under roofline with remote panel lift door and a 6mx9m lock-up garage with concrete floor and power completes the package. Modern fixtures and fittings throughout include high ceilings, LED downlights, plantation shutters, solar panel skylights, quality carpet to bedrooms and easy care tiled flooring to remainder of home.
This property is fully fenced with plenty of room for kids and pets to play. Also includes 10,000 litres of water storage under house, connection of all mains services and chook run.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
RENOVATED JUST FOR YOU - NOTHING TO DO BUT ENJOY!!
***GENUINE SELLERS WILL CONSIDER ALL OFFERS***
Renovated to an exacting standard this comfortable home features 3 bedrooms and a central brand new bathroom featuring double vanity. Located on a quiet street with no through traffic, you can enjoy entertaining in the open plan lounge dining area that flows onto the rear deck overlooking the surrounding neighbourhood. The hub of the home is the kitchen with porcelain sink, dishwasher and 900mm stainless steel oven. Special features include split system heating and cooling and main bedroom with gas feature wall fire. Outside there is a single carport and garden shed. All this with low maintenance living at an affordable price - what an opportunity!! There may never be another one as good as this so call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Janet Hawkins 0409 117 432 or Steve Dolphin on 0412 996609 to arrange your inspection now.
consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Buy the Family this 4 Bed, 2 Bath, 3 Living Home on 1/2 Acre+ for Christmas!
Located close to Cockatoo Township this unique family home on over half an acre is steeped with rustic charm. This mud brick home has been skillfully crafted using mud bricks and rustic timbers creating remarkable character with the space and comfort required for growing families. Created on 2 split levels, the home features 4 big bedrooms including a huge Master with ensuite and plenty of built in robes. Also on this level is the main bathroom with timber vanity, brass fittings and a classic claw foot bath. On the lower level you’ll find the 4th robed bedroom with garden views, a very large family room with cathedral ceilings, an ambient wood fire heater and large windows to let the light flow in & offer picturesque views of the nature that surrounds. The open plan spacious timber kitchen is the heart of this home keeping you connected with family and friends while cooking up a fabulous feast, or relax and entertain in the spacious formal lounge/dining with a 2nd wood heater and gas heating or the sizable rumpus room. Step out onto the covered full length rear verandah onto the timber deck to take in the lush green outlook while relaxing and enjoying the peaceful songs from the abundant bird life. Add to this stunning exposed mud brick walls, slate floors, floating floorboards, earthy tones throughout, walking distance to Cockatoo township and circular driveway. This home is perfect for those needing space for the whole family.
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032
Bethany Day 0438 844 968

Description:
Hamptons Living on 1594m2
It is possible to have it all. A brand new 2 level 5 bedroom 3 bathroom plus powder room characterful weatherboard located in a beautiful rural setting on a manageable 1594m2 and close to transport.
A boutique build with a floor plan that has been carefully considered to provide the most generous 35 squares (approx.) of family living plus alfresco, veranda and front porch.
Parents can enjoy a whole zone to themselves which includes formal lounge, master bedroom with boxed window looking out onto pony paddocks, a luxury fully fitted dressing room with island bench leading through to the master ensuite. The second bedroom on the lower level has been conceived as a possible nursery, guest or study.
Capturing the afternoon sunlight the open plan living, dining and kitchen area will become the heartbeat of your family life. You will naturally gravitate towards the stunning Hamptons meets French provincial peninsula bench with 3 sets of 800mm drawers on one side and bench seating with additional storage under the stone worktops (used throughout).
As to be expected at this level of design and construction, there is a butler's pantry and even that has its own dry pantry! This leads through to the laundry with external door onto the rear veranda.
A wide light-filled stairwell with walk-in storage space under-stairs leads up to a study zone on the landing and a huge rumpus or family living area occupies the front. All additional generous sized bedrooms have hidden walk-in robes with one of the bedrooms upstairs also featuring an ensuite. The main bathroom has bath, shower & double vanity.
There has been no compromise on the quality of feature items such as cornice & skirting, the workmanship is faultless. Nothing is standard. Everything has been done with the look, convenience & comfort in mind.
The Location
This area of Cockatoo has under-gone a transformation in recent times becoming one of the most sought after spots. Close to the newly upgraded sporting facilities of Mountain Road Reserve that includes a basketball stadium, bootcamp style group fitness classes, cricket & footy ground, netball courts, athletics track, walking tracks and home to the Cockatoo Archery Club. Most school transport is available from here or nearby and Cockatoo township is just under 2kms away.
Additional features
2.7 metre ceilings
Alfresco entertaining area
Dual-zone ducted heating
2 split-system air conditioning units
Double garage
4 data points

Description:
ENDLESS POSSIBILITIES ON 1604m2
This original Hills character weatherboard cottage would be perfect for those starting out or on a modest budget, a handyman who would love to renovate or buyers looking for a lovely block to build their dream home on! The home is in need of some TLC, and features a modest kitchen and meals area, bathroom, lounge and three bedrooms. The property is privately located in a quiet and leafy street and is a very useable 1640m2 that features established fruit trees, ample area for parking, and good sized garden shed. This property will allow you to get into the property market and give you the opportunity to create your dream home. Hurry!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Fabulous Family Home on ½ Acre
A horseshoe driveway lined with a lush green hedge welcome you to this lovely 3 bedroom family home. Situated on a comfortable ½ acre block close to Cockatoo township, this home offer space and convenience that families will love. A covered verandah wraps around this home providing both character and the perfect places to sit and enjoy your home. When you enter this home you will be impressed by the spacious living area ideal for the whole family. Soft natural light flood in through the large windows and offers elevated views of the surrounding canopy of trees. Your family’s comfort will be assured with the cosy wood fire heater, gas ducted heating and the split system cooling. The open plan kitchen provides space to cook up a treat and features a 5 gas burner cooktop, large pantry and Bosch dishwasher. There are 3 robed bedrooms with the Master having a large walk through robe and ensuite. This home also features painted wall panels, 4.5kW solar panels to save you money, ceiling fans and modern floating floors. Outside there is an impressive shed complete with concrete floor, power and a bar area – loads of room for cars, hobbies, or whatever your heart desires. Included in the shed is a separate room ideal for visitor accommodation. There is so much opportunity to further enhance the large block and large under house space to cater for growing family requirements. This unique home is a must see.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Stephen Richards 0400 100 155

Description:
Such Comforts & Views Are Rare in this Price Range!
This architecturally designed home with magnificent views definitely has the WOW factor! The modern colourbond clad exterior of this home is embraced by the use of natural timbers, stone and iron delivering a uniquely designed home with a strong contemporary flavour and there is excellent fencing to ensure your privacy and so you can keep an eye on all your visitors as they arrive and keep your family safe and sound. From the timber entry deck you enter into the spacious foyer/sitting room from which two robed bedrooms are located. Both these bedrooms have access to the family bathroom, separate toilet and large laundry. Venturing up the stairs from the foyer leads to the natural light filled large open plan living, dining and kitchen. Polished floorboards, stone walls, timber bench tops and huge walk in pantry make the kitchen both practical and a feature of this living area. The amazing views of the surrounding hills can be appreciated through the large windows & doors that make up the northern wall of this area which also opens onto the timber deck outside where you can relax and enjoy the peaceful sounds of nature. The spacious master bedroom includes a spa, large walk in robe and full ensuite. Large windows again allow the stunning views to be enjoyed from the master bedroom. Outside wide industrial stairs take you from the upper timber deck to the fully fenced back yard where a stone path leads to a timber deck gazebo and fire pit where long summer nights can be enjoyed with family and friends. Also featuring established gardens, mature trees, garden shed, onsite parking for 6+ cars, storage room and plenty of space - this home is definitely a must see!
PARKING AT TOP OF THE DRIVE & ENTER VIEW HILL RD VIA PATERNOSTER RD - CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
BEAUTIFUL FAMILY HOME PLUS 2 BEDROOM UNIT
On a sun filled block only minutes from central Cockatoo this well maintained 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom home has an added bonus of a second 2 bedroom 1 bathroom/laundry building plus a large garage and double carport with sealed drive. The main home consists of 3 good size rooms 2 with built in robes, main bathroom with separate toilet, good size lounge with gas log fire place, kitchen with timber bench tops over-looking the meals area and connected to a sunroom - a perfect spot to enjoy your morning coffee.
Some special features include gas heating, hot water control from the kitchen and bathroom, outdoor grassed flat entertaining area and attached double carport, also garaging and workshop. The 2 bedroom cottage is perfect for the in-laws, adult children and long term guest stay with kitchen, bathroom/laundry and spacious living including split system – so anyone would be comfortable staying here! This home with the design for many different family situations may just be the one you are looking for, with the bonus of proximity to the shop, schools and public transport of Cockatoo and Puffing Billy at your door step this is a lifestyle property that won’t be around long.
Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684 522 or Steve Dolphin on 0412 996609 to arrange your inspection today.

Description:
STYLISH CONTEMPORARY, SUNNY ½ ACRE WITH A HUGE SHED
Please respect our tenant and not park in the driveway and call the agent to arrange an inspection, we are more than happy to show you through. This property has it all! Land……yes, open and sunny ½ acre fully fenced, a 10.4 mts x 10.4 mts (approx) barn style shed, a stunning rendered home with all the modern fittings and fixtures we like to have, ducted heating and cooling, chic bathroom, beautiful kitchen with stainless steel appointments and a neutral palette throughout. Just bring your furniture and move in, not a cent to spend. The home also features three bedrooms with built in robes, a large open plan, living/dining room and a separate laundry.
Set in a fabulous location in the thriving township of Cockatoo with nearby bus connections, mountain bike rides or walks through Wrights Forest, local markets, shops, sporting clubs and a primary school.
Best be quick for this one as huge garaging and modern homes are hard to come by. Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522 or Steve Dolphin on 0412 996609 or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection today.

Description:
WHAT A GREAT PLACE TO CALL HOME – 2023m2
Perfectly positioned on a peaceful and private allotment that offers a wonderful outlook over the picturesque Hills town of Cockatoo is this quality brick family home. Featuring two living spaces that include a large lounge and a dining/meals room that is overlooked by the spacious kitchen, 3 generous bedrooms with master that includes a full ensuite. Special features include a cosy wood fire, reverse cycle heating and cooling, a fresh modern colour scheme throughout and large windows that allow plenty of natural light to flow through the home. Outside you will discover a magnificent 1/2 acre allotment that offers a sealed driveway, large lawn areas, a variety of fruit trees, established landscaped gardens, single car garage under roofline plus multiple areas to entertain with covered front and rear verandas that will be the perfect place to just sit back and unwind in your very own hills sanctuary. Just a short walk to the shops, kindergarten and walking trails, properties as good as this good are few and far between.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Immaculate Home with Beautiful, Private Outlook!
This is a must see home for first home buyers, investors or downsizers! The sealed driveway and beautifully landscaped gardens, full of soft ferns, provide the perfect welcome to this home. This lovely home has a country cabin look and has been tastefully renovated throughout giving the interior a bright clean feel with white painted timber and log paneling. The home has 3 bedrooms all with soft carpet & big windows, a stylish bathroom, spacious family room and a well appointed kitchen with stainless dishwasher, gas cook top and an island bench. Other features include a toasty wood heater, mains gas ducted heating, alarm, split system cooling, pitched ceilings throughout the home and quality window furnishings. Outside the wrap around verandah provides the perfect places for you to relax and enjoy the surrounding lush treescape of this private oasis. The back yard is also tastefully landscaped and is fully fenced. Homes in this price range of such quality are rare and inspection will not disappoint.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
Family Home That Ticks All The Boxes!
Situated an easy 15 minute stroll to Cockatoo, the Kindergarten, the Primary School, local shops, cafes & public transport this split level 4 bedroom family home leaves nothing to do but move in & enjoy. With an elevated aspect, the timber deck around two sides of the home provides a wonderful view and the perfect place to relax and enjoy the lush green surroundings. The home features 4 good sized bedrooms with built in robes, the Master with an ensuite & direct access to a private, undercover courtyard with 6 person outdoor spa. A wonderful feeling of space is created with cathedral ceilings, neutral tones and large windows welcome an abundance of natural light & a peaceful treed outlook from every window. The well-appointed kitchen features a 5 burner gas stove, electric oven, dishwasher & convenient island bench & opens onto the 2nd living area which has an air conditioner & access to a 2nd fully fenced outdoor entertaining area. There is also a spacious formal lounge & dining room with an air-conditioner for added comfort whilst the home has mains GDH throughout to keep you warm and cosy in the cooler months. Outside the property is fully fenced making it ideal for the kids & four legged friends to play safely. Also included is a double lock-up shed and a beautifully landscaped garden full of ferns, waratahs, roses and magnolias. Add the convenience of all mains services, this tidy & comfortable family home ticks all the boxes! This unique home is a must see.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Delightful Character Home!
This lovely character home is situated on a cleared quarter acre block with peaceful filtered views. The attractive facade makes it a pleasure to come home. The home offers 3 bedrooms, the Master with walk in robe and ensuite, spacious kitchen with loads of bench space, dishwasher and 900mm freestanding gas cook top and large windows to capture natural light and sunshine. There are 2 living areas, the lounge at the front with bay window then the open plan family and meals area. This opens out to the undercover balcony with elevated vistas of the trees beyond. Features include painted timber panelling, beautiful warm floating floor, a double sided toasty wood heater and high ceilings. To add to the features the home has double glazed casement windows throughout making it comfortable all year round regardless of the weather. Outside the property is fully fenced with a neat cleared lawn in the front and double carport then to the rear you have lane way access to the 2 car lock up garage, perfect for storing all sorts of vehicles such as trailers, caravans etc. Add to this a water tank for the garden, another shed for storage and a nice cleared big back yard for the kids and your furry friends and you have a fantastic family home. An inspection will reveal all this property has to offer.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Stephen Richards 0400 100 155

Description:
**UNDER CONTRACT ** VENDOR WANTS IT SOLD THIS WEEKEND OR IT WILL BE RENTED OUT. MAKE AN OFFER!!!
*** GENUINE SELLERS***
Get out of the rent race and put your money into something that is yours.
On a very flat and sunny block, this 3 bedroom home represents excellent value and potential in today's market with the master bedroom being HUGE!! Both the bathroom and kitchen have been updated, the latter with a stainless steel trio: 1. wall oven 2. gas hot plates 3. dishwasher. In addition, there is a separate laundry, outdoor toilet, front porch and outdoor entertaining space. Plenty of off-street parking on the usable 900 m2 allotment with the added comfort of ducted heating and a wood fire. The current zoning may offer the potential for future subdivision, subject to council approval. Just a short stroll to the main street, a variety of shops pre and primary school, sporting facilities and bus connections and on a sealed road.
Call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Steve Dolphin 0412 996 609 or Mat Fitch 0473 363 606 to arrange an inspection.
